code:
erDiagram
    User ||--o| UserProfile : "has"
    User ||--o{ ForumCategory : "moderates"
    User ||--o{ Thread : "creates"
    User ||--o{ Post : "writes"
    User ||--o{ Tag : "follows"
    User ||--o{ Report : "submits"
    User ||--o{ Notification : "receives"
    User ||--o{ UserGroup : "member_of"
    User ||--o{ MentorshipRelation : "mentor_or_mentee"

    ForumCategory ||--o| ForumCategory : "parent"
    ForumCategory ||--o{ Thread : "contains"
    ForumCategory ||--o| Community : "belongs_to"

    Thread ||--o{ Post : "has_replies"
    Thread ||--o{ Tag : "tagged_with"
    Thread }o--|| User : "created_by"
    Thread }o--|| ForumCategory : "in_category"

    Post ||--o| Post : "reply_to"
    Post }o--|| Thread : "belongs_to"
    Post }o--|| User : "authored_by"
    Post ||--o{ Report : "reported_in"

    Tag ||--o{ Thread : "applied_to"
    Tag ||--o{ Resource : "tagged_on"

    Report }o--|| User : "reported_by"
    Report }o--o| Post : "targets_post"
    Report }o--o| Thread : "targets_thread"

    Community ||--o{ ForumCategory : "has_categories"
    Community ||--o{ Resource : "has_resources"
    Community ||--o{ UserGroup : "has_groups"
    Community ||--o{ Event : "hosts"

    Resource ||--o{ Tag : "tagged_with"
    Resource }o--|| User : "uploaded_by"
    Resource ||--o{ ResourceVersion : "has_versions"

    UserGroup ||--o{ User : "has_members"
    UserGroup }o--|| Community : "within"

    Event ||--o{ EventRegistration : "has_registrations"
    Event }o--|| Community : "hosted_by"

    EventRegistration }o--|| User : "registered_by"
    EventRegistration }o--|| Event : "for_event"

    User {
        string documentId PK
        string username UK
        string email UK
        string password
        boolean confirmed
        boolean blocked
        datetime createdAt
        datetime updatedAt
    }

    UserProfile {
        string documentId PK
        string display_name
        text bio
        string expertise_areas
        string institution
        string country
        string linkedin_url
        media avatar
        integer reputation_score
        integer post_count
        enum trust_level
        json notification_preferences
        boolean available_as_mentor
    }

    Community {
        string documentId PK
        string name UK
        string slug UK
        text description
        enum type
        json settings
        enum privacy_level
        enum status
        media logo
    }

    ForumCategory {
        string documentId PK
        string name
        string slug UK
        text description
        integer sort_order
        boolean is_locked
        enum visibility
        media icon
    }

    Thread {
        string documentId PK
        string title
        string slug UK
        richtext content
        enum status
        boolean is_pinned
        boolean is_locked
        boolean is_answered
        integer view_count
        integer reply_count
        datetime last_activity_at
    }

    Post {
        string documentId PK
        richtext content
        boolean is_accepted_answer
        boolean is_hidden
        string moderation_reason
        integer upvote_count
        integer downvote_count
        datetime edited_at
    }

    Tag {
        string documentId PK
        string name UK
        string slug UK
        text description
        string color
        integer usage_count
    }

    Report {
        string documentId PK
        enum reason
        text description
        enum status
        text moderator_notes
        datetime resolved_at
    }

    Notification {
        string documentId PK
        enum type
        string title
        text message
        boolean is_read
        json metadata
    }

    Resource {
        string documentId PK
        string title
        string slug UK
        richtext description
        enum resource_type
        media file
        string external_url
        enum visibility
        integer download_count
        date publication_date
        json metadata
    }

    ResourceVersion {
        string documentId PK
        string version_number
        text change_notes
        media file
    }

    UserGroup {
        string documentId PK
        string name
        string slug UK
        text description
        enum group_type
        enum privacy
        media banner
    }

    Event {
        string documentId PK
        string title
        richtext description
        datetime start_datetime
        datetime end_datetime
        enum event_type
        string location
        string virtual_link
        integer max_participants
        boolean issues_certificate
    }

    EventRegistration {
        string documentId PK
        enum status
        datetime registered_at
        boolean attended
        boolean certificate_issued
    }

    MentorshipRelation {
        string documentId PK
        enum status
        text goals
        datetime started_at
        datetime ended_at
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
